QuestData.Title: Surveying the Wharf
QuestData.Description:
Thresher's Wharf is a bustling fishing hub just across the delta from Fort Daelin.
It was also in the direct war path of the naga -- who knows what remains now.
If you could stop in and check in on its leader, Coxswain Hook, you'd have my gratitude. I must focus on tending to the wounded here and preparing for the naga's next assault.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Coxswain Hook in Thresher's Wharf.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, just what I needed. A fresh set o' ears to hear a tale or two!
